One can craft very interesting things with pieces of the Undead, if one may live long enough or know a clever enough collector of their pieces.
One possible recipe for a mighty shield would be this one:
Trebor's Barricade ------------------------------- one Lich skull 16 Rubicite Ingots 2 Medium Tanned leather hides
Process: 1. Remove the Lich skull from the lich, preferably in one piece.
2. Combine the rubicite ingots in the forge when the moon is dark and the wails of the banshee may be heard.
3. Once the shell is cast, use the leather hides to attach the Lich skull with Ronan's stitch pattern # 42.
4. Mutter the following incantation: M'wha Uk'la O'ples
A flash of brimstone later and you should have a fine crafted shield.
